oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Entwicklung ökologischer Regionalsorten bei Ackerbohnen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHAOUTI, Lamiae
Vogt-Kaute, Werner
Link, Dr. Wolfgang
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The agronomic performance of faba bean showing a range of genotypic structures (heterozygosity, heterogeneity) was analysed in four different organic locations and one conventional location in 2004. Heterogeneous and heterozygous genotypes were most often highest performing (grain yield). The project is continued.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} Entwicklung ökologischer Regionalsorten bei Ackerbohnen. [Development of region-specific organic cultivars in faba bean.] Facility Leader(s): Link, Prof. Dr- Wolfgang, Institut für Pflanzenbau und Pflanzenzüchtung Universität Göttingen.
